co.cask.cdap.api

Interface ProgramLifecycle<T extends RuntimeContext>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of the program runtime context
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Flowlet, Procedure, ServiceWorker, Worker
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractFlowlet, AbstractProcedure, AbstractServiceWorker, AbstractWorker

    public interface ProgramLifecycle<T extends RuntimeContext>
    Defines program lifecycle.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void destroy()
      Destroy is the last thing that gets called before the program is shutdown.
      void initialize(T context)
      Initializes a Program.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        void initialize(T context)
                throws Exception
        Initializes a Program.

        This method will be called only once per ProgramLifecycle instance.

        Parameters:
        context - An instance of RuntimeContext
        Throws:
        Exception - If there is any error during initialization.

      • destroy

        void destroy()
        Destroy is the last thing that gets called before the program is shutdown. So, if there are any cleanups then they can be specified here.
